summary: Provides a Qiskit circuit class that generates quantum‑volume benchmark circuits by stacking layers of randomly selected two‑qubit SU(4) gates on random bipartitions of the qubits, optionally inserting permutation gates to shuffle qubit ordering.
business_intent: Enable users to create standardized random circuits for evaluating the quantum‑volume metric, facilitating performance benchmarking and comparison of quantum hardware and simulators.
